A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: STAR WARS! What can I say? I loved it. Though it wasn't a perfect movie pacing wise\, the good was so amazing as to make up for it. The fights were incredible. The characters were strong. I especially loved the Rey/Kylo dynamic. And the Force has never been cooler. I saw it twice in 24 hours. I don't get why some people haven't liked it. Structurally the Force Awakens worked better\, but this was new and took risks. For me\, they definitely paid off.
